mapper.insert: insert into tasks (task_title, status, priority, started_date, predict_finished_date, explanation, complete_rate, fixed_cost, required_time, mini_project_id) VALUES (#{task_title}, #{status}, #{priority}, #{started_date},#{predict_finished_date},#{explanation},#{complete_rate},#{fixed_cost}, #{required_time},#{mini_project_id});
mapper.update: update tasks set task_title = #{task_title}, status = #{status}, priority = #{priority}, started_date = #{started_date}, predict_finished_date = #{predict_finished_date}, explanation = #{explanation}, complete_rate = #{complete_rate}, fixed_cost = #{fixed_cost}, required_time = #{required_time}, mini_project_id = #{mini_project_id} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select id, task_title, status, priority, started_date, predict_finished_date, explanation, complete_rate, fixed_cost, required_time, mini_project_id from tasks where id = #{id};

select id, task_title, status, priority, started_date, predict_finished_date, explanation, complete_rate, fixed_cost, required_time, mini_project_id from tasks where task_title LIKE '%${param1}%' and case when ${param2} = 100 then status<= 3 else status = ${param2} end and case when ${param3} = 100 then priority <= 2 else priority = ${param3} end and case when ${param4} = 100 then 1 = 1 else mini_project_id = ${param4} end order by ${param5} ${param6};
